title: BRIEF-Barrian Mining Signs Letter Of Intent To Acquire Troy Canyon In Nevada
text:
BRIEF-Barrian Mining Signs Letter Of Intent To Acquire Troy Canyon In Nevada

Stock Markets 40 minutes ago (Sep 10, 2019 03:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Barrian Mining Signs Letter Of Intent To Acquire Troy Canyon In Nevada Sept 10 (Reuters) - Barrian Mining Corp : * BARRIAN MINING SIGNS LETTER OF INTENT TO ACQUIRE TROY CANYON IN NEVADA NEAR BOLO WITH HIGH GRADE GOLD AND SILVER * ACQUISITION OF EARLY-STAGE TROY CANYON PROJECT WILL PROVIDE SYNERGIES WITH CO'S NEARBY, FLAGSHIP BOLO PROJECT * BARRIAN MINING- CO MAY ACQUIRE 100% INTEREST IN TROY PROJECT BY MAKING CASH PAYMENTS AND SHARE PAYMENTS OF COMMON SHARES IN CAPITAL OF BARRIAN

BRIEF-Barrian Mining Signs Letter Of Intent To Acquire Troy Canyon In Nevada
description: BRIEF-Barrian Mining Signs Letter Of Intent To Acquire Troy Canyon In Nevada
